mapper.sql: SELECT A.SCHLSHIP_NO , B.SCHO_NM , C.COM_CODE_NM PYMNT_SE , SUBSTR(A.SEMSTR_NO,1,4) SEMSTR_YEAR , SUBSTR(A.SEMSTR_NO,5,1) SEMSTR_NO FROM SCHOLARSHIP A INNER JOIN SCHOLARSHIP_LIST B ON(A.SCHO_SE = B.SCHO_SE) INNER JOIN COM_CODE C ON (A.PYMNT_SE = C.COM_CODE) WHERE C.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC025' ORDER BY A.SEMSTR_NO DESC, C.COM_CODE_NM
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.SCHLSHIP_NO , B.SCHO_NM , A.SCHLSHIP_TRGTER , SCHLSHIP_SELECTN , TO_CHAR(A.SCHLSHIP_AMOUNT, 'FM999,999,999,999')||' 원' AS SCHLSHIP_AMOUNT_STR , C.COM_CODE_NM PYMNT_SE , SUBSTR(A.SEMSTR_NO,1,4) SEMSTR_YEAR , SUBSTR(A.SEMSTR_NO,5,1) SEMSTR_NO FROM SCHOLARSHIP A INNER JOIN SCHOLARSHIP_LIST B ON(A.SCHO_SE = B.SCHO_SE) INNER JOIN COM_CODE C ON (A.PYMNT_SE = C.COM_CODE) WHERE C.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC025' AND A.SCHLSHIP_NO = #{schlshipNo} ) A
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT SCHO_NM FROM SCHOLARSHIP_LIST ORDER BY SCHO_NM )
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT SCHO_NM FROM SCHOLARSHIP_LIST ORDER BY SCHO_NM ) B ) A
